title: unable to connect to chat!! :[

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I need help! it would pop this up amd if i try to reconnect it wouldnt work. i will try and try but it wouldnt work. theres a few necro threads that i tried around 2014-15 and none of thsoe worked. :[ its only happening today too{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: There were some issues with chat servers last night, but everything looks to be fine now!  Make sure to bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for updates on issues like this.  Let me know if you still have this issue!

You should be checking the current issues on top of the client or launcher signified by a /!\ sign or here ( http://status.leagueoflegends.com/ ). There is currently a chat issue that Riot are fixing. You will have to wait until they fix it.
